RgltyCodeRegClauseVer.name: RgltyCodeRegClauseVer
RgltyCodeRegClauseVer.description: Represents a junction between Regulatory Code and Regulation Clause Version objects.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency associated with the Regulatory Code Regulation Clause Version.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: The name of the Regulatory Code Regulation Clause Version.

RegulationClauseVersionId.description: The Regulation Clause Version associated with the record.

RegulatoryCodeId.description: The Regulatory Code associated with the record.
